body:
Hi Theodoros,

I am having a look at butterfly today - looked at the installation instructions and links to openfoam no longer appear to work (for me anyway).



Googling, it looks like the openfoam website has changed to Openfoam.org - no longer openfoam.com.



I was looking at your instruction files here:



[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/wiki/Getting-Started-...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Butterfly/wiki/Getting-Started-with-butterfly#1-installing-openfoam)



Is this now the correct place to download from: [http://openfoam.org/download/](http://openfoam.org/download/)



Kind Regards

Lyndon



I will 





[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/any-update-on-the-butterf...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/any-update-on-the-butterfly?groupUrl=ladybug&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987&id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1536958&page=2#comments)
